ASP:
% The three basic objects.
subject(S):- triplet(S,_,_).
relation(R):- triplet(_,R,_).
object(O):- triplet(_,_,O).

% Put a link between subjects and objects.
link(S,O):- triplet(S,_,O).

% labels on edges and nodes
label(S,O,R):- triplet(S,R,O).
label(S,S):- subject(S).
label(O,O):- object(O).

% Put an arrow on edges
obj_property(edge,arrowhead,normal).
description: Basic implementation of rules to show RDF in visual
name: rdf_shower
